## Description {#details}

This header enumerates the LLVM-provided high-level optimization levels.

Each level has a specific goal and rationale.

<Link id="l00016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="16"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="preprocessor">#define LLVM&#95;PASSES&#95;OPTIMIZATIONLEVEL&#95;H</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="19"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="22" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/optimizationlevel"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">class </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">OptimizationLevel final &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="23"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> SpeedLevel = 2;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="24"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> SizeLevel = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="25"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/optimizationlevel/#a2fde7b3b9f2a8c78d09bed66bc70179e">OptimizationLevel</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> SpeedLevel, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> SizeLevel)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="26"><Highlight kind="normal">      : SpeedLevel(SpeedLevel), SizeLevel(SizeLevel) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Check that only valid combinations are passed.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(SpeedLevel &lt;= 3 &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="29"><Highlight kind="normal">           </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Optimization level for speed should be 0, 1, 2, or 3&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="30"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(SizeLevel &lt;= 2 &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="31"><Highlight kind="normal">           </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Optimization level for size should be 0, 1, or 2&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="32"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>((SizeLevel == 0 || SpeedLevel == 2) &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="33"><Highlight kind="normal">           </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Optimize for size should be encoded with speedup level == 2&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="34"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="35"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="36"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">public</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="37" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/optimizationlevel/#a2fde7b3b9f2a8c78d09bed66bc70179e"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/optimizationlevel/#a2fde7b3b9f2a8c78d09bed66bc70179e">OptimizationLevel</a>() = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">default</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="38"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Disable as many optimizations as possible. This doesn&#39;t completely</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="39"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// disable the optimizer in all cases, for example always&#95;inline functions</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="40"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// can be required to be inlined for correctness.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="41" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/optimizationlevel/#a6ca9e4f5478a77fa91fc56e1f1f6ba24"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> OptimizationLevel <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/optimizationlevel/#a6ca9e4f5478a77fa91fc56e1f1f6ba24">O0</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="42"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="43"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Optimize quickly without destroying debuggability.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="44"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="45"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// This level is tuned to produce a result from the optimizer as quickly</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="46"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// as possible and to avoid destroying debuggability. This tends to result</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="47"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// in a very good development mode where the compiled code will be</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="48"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// immediately executed as part of testing. As a consequence, where</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="49"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// possible, we would like to produce efficient-to-execute code, but not</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="50"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// if it significantly slows down compilation or would prevent even basic</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="51"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// debugging of the resulting binary.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="52"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="53"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// As an example, complex loop transformations such as versioning,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="54"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// vectorization, or fusion don&#39;t make sense here due to the degree to</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="55"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// which the executed code differs from the source code, and the compile</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="56"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// time cost.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="57" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/optimizationlevel/#acfab17afad8d19eb90de02e684900ccd"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> OptimizationLevel <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/optimizationlevel/#acfab17afad8d19eb90de02e684900ccd">O1</a>;</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="58"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Optimize for fast execution as much as possible without triggering</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="59"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// significant incremental compile time or code size growth.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="60"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="61"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// The key idea is that optimizations at this level should &quot;pay for</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="62"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// themselves&quot;. So if an optimization increases compile time by 5% or</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="63"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// increases code size by 5% for a particular benchmark, that benchmark</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="64"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// should also be one which sees a 5% runtime improvement. If the compile</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="65"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// time or code size penalties happen on average across a diverse range of</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// LLVM users&#39; benchmarks, then the improvements should as well.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// And no matter what, the compile time needs to not grow superlinearly</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="69"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// with the size of input to LLVM so that users can control the runtime of</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// the optimizer in this mode.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// This is expected to be a good default optimization level for the vast</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// majority of users.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/optimizationlevel/#a9c0836ff9219a0b737a11979991c3389"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> OptimizationLevel <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/optimizationlevel/#a9c0836ff9219a0b737a11979991c3389">O2</a>;</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Optimize for fast execution as much as possible.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// This mode is significantly more aggressive in trading off compile time</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// and code size to get execution time improvements. The core idea is that</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// this mode should include any optimization that helps execution time on</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// balance across a diverse collection of benchmarks, even if it increases</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// code size or compile time for some benchmarks without corresponding</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// improvements to execution time.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Despite being willing to trade more compile time off to get improved</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// execution time, this mode still tries to avoid superlinear growth in</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// order to make even significantly slower compile times at least scale</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// reasonably. This does not preclude very substantial constant factor</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// costs though.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/optimizationlevel/#a097296a5feaefc188dafa71b19204714"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> OptimizationLevel <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/optimizationlevel/#a097296a5feaefc188dafa71b19204714">O3</a>;</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Similar to \\c O2 but tries to optimize for small code size instead of</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// fast execution without triggering significant incremental execution</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// time slowdowns.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// The logic here is exactly the same as \\c O2, but with code size and</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// execution time metrics swapped.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// A consequence of the different core goal is that this should in general</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// produce substantially smaller executables that still run in</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// a reasonable amount of time.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/optimizationlevel/#a73679792a87ec44543a1cc09a5d8c3cc"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> OptimizationLevel <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/optimizationlevel/#a73679792a87ec44543a1cc09a5d8c3cc">Os</a>;</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// A very specialized mode that will optimize for code size at any and all</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// costs.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// This is useful primarily when there are absolute size limitations and</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// any effort taken to reduce the size is worth it regardless of the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// execution time impact. You should expect this level to produce rather</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// slow, but very small, code.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/optimizationlevel/#a1e916712888d6a2d3952834c126460e7"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> OptimizationLevel <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/optimizationlevel/#a1e916712888d6a2d3952834c126460e7">Oz</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/optimizationlevel/#ac8b4922e348da3964aace032c1da4108"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/optimizationlevel/#ac8b4922e348da3964aace032c1da4108">isOptimizingForSpeed</a>()</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword"> const </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> SizeLevel == 0 &amp;&amp; SpeedLevel &gt; 0; &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/optimizationlevel/#a1e2715d84143938c4eea797507559408"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/optimizationlevel/#a1e2715d84143938c4eea797507559408">isOptimizingForSize</a>()</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword"> const </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> SizeLevel &gt; 0; &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/optimizationlevel/#a15d421eddeb112ae94ec5cd9a7c80564"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/optimizationlevel/#a15d421eddeb112ae94ec5cd9a7c80564">operator==</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> OptimizationLevel &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9eb4f5b98b70ee4fab9614ed58282c1fa6311ae17c1ee52b36e68aaf4ad066387">Other</a>)</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword"> const </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> SizeLevel == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9eb4f5b98b70ee4fab9614ed58282c1fa6311ae17c1ee52b36e68aaf4ad066387">Other</a>.SizeLevel &amp;&amp; SpeedLevel == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9eb4f5b98b70ee4fab9614ed58282c1fa6311ae17c1ee52b36e68aaf4ad066387">Other</a>.SpeedLevel;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/optimizationlevel/#a8f1296b820d60dccd2a6bae2ac4fd5e4"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/optimizationlevel/#a8f1296b820d60dccd2a6bae2ac4fd5e4">operator!=</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> OptimizationLevel &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9eb4f5b98b70ee4fab9614ed58282c1fa6311ae17c1ee52b36e68aaf4ad066387">Other</a>)</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword"> const </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> SizeLevel != <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9eb4f5b98b70ee4fab9614ed58282c1fa6311ae17c1ee52b36e68aaf4ad066387">Other</a>.SizeLevel || SpeedLevel != <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9eb4f5b98b70ee4fab9614ed58282c1fa6311ae17c1ee52b36e68aaf4ad066387">Other</a>.SpeedLevel;</Highlight></CodeLine>
